name: dare
description: Gives you a random dare to answer.

name: guide
description: Shows you how to use the bot.

name: help
description: Shows a list of all the 'Would You' commands.

name: higherlower
description: Starts a game of 'Higher or Lower'.

name: info
description: Gives you information about the bot.

name: language
description: Changes the language for your server.

name: leaderboard
description: Shows the top scores for a game.

name: neverhaveiever
description: Gives you a 'Never Have I Ever' question.

name: ping
description: Checks how fast the bot responds.

name: random
description: Gives you a random truth or dare question to answer.

name: settings
description: Lets you change different bot settings.

name: support
description: Gives you a link to get help.

name: truth
description: Gives you a random truth question to answer.

name: wouldyourather
description: Gives you a 'Would You Rather' question.

name: whatwouldyoudo
description: Gives you a 'What Would You Do' question.

name: custom
description: Lets you manage your own questions.

name: type
description: Changes the kind of questions you get.
